snippet: The violinist Joshua Bell made his American debut as music director of the Academy of St. Martin in the Fields on Thursday at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of works by Beethoven and Mozart performed by the Academy of St Martin in the Fields, conducted by Joshua Bell, at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: The violinist Joshua Bell made his American debut as music director of the Academy of St. Martin in the Fields on Thursday at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.seo: Joshua Bell Leads Academy of St. Martin in the Fields
headline.main: A Violinist Wielding Both Bow and Baton
headline.print_headline: A Violinist Wielding Both Bow and Baton

keywords.value: Academy of St Martin in the Fields
